\begin{tcAthena}
declare andb3: [Bool Bool Bool] -> Bool

assert* andb3-def := [((andb3 T T T) = T)
                      ((andb3 F _ _) = F)
                      ((andb3 _ F _) = F)
                      ((andb3 _ _ F) = F)]

> (eval andb3 T F T)

Term: F

> (eval andb3 T T T)

Term: T
\end{tcAthena}
